title: details element
description: The details element represents a disclosure widget from which the user can obtain additional information or controls.

references.title: WHATWG HTML5 spec for the details element

assertions.title: convey the group role or convey the group as presentational
assertions.rationale: A user needs to be aware that they are entering grouped content.
examples: A screen reader might announce the role as "group" or "details"
A screen reader might consider the group as presentational and not convey a group role

assertions.title: convey the boundaries of the details element if the group role is conveyed
assertions.rationale: A user needs to know when they enter and exist the details.
examples: A screen reader might imply the start of the group by announcing the group role when entering the group
A screen reader might announce "leaving group" when exiting the group
A screen reader might consider the group to be presentational and not convey any group semantics
